body.name: Boomcore Dual Bluetooth Speakers Set, Portable Speakers Set of 2 with Stereo Sound, Audio Enhancement Tech, IPX7 Waterproof Speaker with Clip for Indoor Outdoor - Navy Blue Teal
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 mins
features: 360 Stereo Speakers: Wireless speaker provide a clearer and more natural stereo sound quality compared to single speakers. By adjustment of the sound based on various factors, ClearTone Technology provides the most accurate sound transmission, while our digital signal processing algorithm enhances audio signals to deliver refined and more detailed sound quality with ease. Enjoy your private theater anywhere.

Small but Powerful: Two travel Bluetooth speakers with one purchase. This shower speaker offers custom outdoor audio by a 1.69 inch neodymium driver and a symmetrical magnetic circuit integrated with a thumbsucker and passive radiator. With exclusive technology, the portable speaker reproduces a wider and louder sound. Be the party-king at any time.

12H Long Lasting: This outdoor speakers with clip has a built-in 1800mAh rechargeable cell that lasts up to a day on a single charge, twice as long as similar speakers. With a max playtime of 12 hours (Various on volume level and audio content), mini speaker can be a sound enhancer for any of your Bluetooth devices. Two-Way Audio Transmission Technology ensures a stable connection. No need to worry about disconnection while biking or hiking.

Ultra-portable Rugged Speakers: This IPX7 waterproof Bluetooth speakers for kayaking is super portable. It comes with a built-in fabric loop and an extra carabiner, ideal for beach, biking, camping, fishing, golf carts, parks, yard and gardens. Its pocket-size makes it the perfect companion for both indoor and outdoor activities.

Advanced Safety Features: This travel speaker is extremely safe without overheating. Features a unique dynamic following voltage regulation technology to dynamically adjust according to the audio signal. This makes it a perfect tech gift for men and women's like workouts and sports. Save $3.49 on delivery when you buy two at once, compared to buying two separately.

Can they function independently and play music from one device? Yes, they work independently as well as paired for stereo, they’d just have to connect via Bluetooth separately. When you turn them on, you either link them together, to play from one device, or you don’t. Can they function independently and play music from one device? Yes, they work independently as well as paired for stereo, they’d just have to connect via Bluetooth separately. When you turn them on, you either link them together, to play from one device, or you don’t. Will these speakers pair with a TV？ As long as your TV has Bluetooth, just set the speakers in pairing mode then go to TV Settings, Audio and Pair Bluetooth Device. That's it! Can these be connected and one placed outside and the other inside? Yes, as long as each one is within range(16ft) and not a cement wall. While the optimal distance is 23inch between original source and the farthest speaker. How to troubleshoot Bluetooth connection? 1. Press and hold the TWS button for 3 seconds to reset 2. Close and re-open the Bluetooth on the device 3. Minimize the distance (less than 32.8 ft) between the speaker and the paired device

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: Using velcro I created a kick stand for it.Works well, sounds good, easy to use. I wish it had an SD card slot, but, you can't have it all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great speaker for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This is definately a solid little speaker for the price. Well made, easy to pair and use and a great sound. Definately recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I walk into my house after work and hubs is grooving to smooth jazz…He says to me “it sounds good doesn’t it, that’s the speaker you got me for Christmas”.I thought it was the more expensive sound bar that starts with a BThe Hi-Fi quality, impeccable clarity, great atmospheric sound is just crazy good for such a small speaker

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Double click for Google Assistant!
reviews.reviewText: Great design and features:The same button used to play/pause and answer/hang-up, can be double clicked for Google Assistant.The same button can also be held to decline a call. The volume buttons can be held for FF and RW.There's a button to pair two of these for stereo output.There's a power/pairing button.Three different colors of LED to indicate charge level.Great form factor:No sharp edges. Soft touch materials. Feels durable. Fits in one hand like a small walkie talkie. The charging port is tucked under a rubber plug.Should work well for snowboarding; music and calls.The sound is as fine for such a small speaker. Not sure if a JBL Go 3 would sound any better, but this has 5 watts versus 4 on the JBL.Only real negative is the Amazon description here states 8 Watts and not 5.If I'm being nitpicky it would also help if the buttons were a different color than the rest. Black on black isn't awesome but the layout is very simple, with the volume and multi-function buttons on one side and the power and stereo pairing buttons on top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good bass for its size and pricepoint
reviews.reviewText: This is the third brand of small bluetooth speaker I have purchased in the last 6 months, and this is by far the best sounding and best value for the money. For reference, the other two I have purchased are the 40w monster mfs1 and a 10w sanag bluetooth speaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING LITTLE SPEAKER!!! Very Loud, Amazing Bass!
reviews.reviewText: I was shopping for a very portable bluetooth speaker recently. It came down to this and a JBL Go 3. I've actually purchased both & compared the two. This little speaker from a company I had never heard of before was VERY surprising. It's LOUDER than the JBL, has more BASS than the JBL & has the same fidelity/sound quality as the JBL. The battery also lasts about twice as long as the JBL. The only thing the JBL improves on is a slightly lower bluetooth latency. But unless you have them next to each other going at the same time, you'll never notice. I also LOVE the full rubberized plastic feel of this little speaker. The carry loop is nice & centered on the speaker, it doesn't make some annoying noise when starting up/connecting, it has a nice cover on the USB-C charging port & even includes a carabiner for latching onto backpacks/etc. I honestly can't recommend this speaker highly enough. If you're looking for a portable bluetooth speaker with amazing sound, this is the one to pick!The seller/manufacturer is also extremely responsive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great speaker for its size
reviews.reviewText: For such a small speaker it packs a sound like a bigger speaker but let see if still this way

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini Thumping Bass Machine!
reviews.reviewText: This review is based off what I was looking for in a mini speaker. Out the box Boomcore about 3/4 inch longer than JBL Go3, but about the same size on other 2 axis. It's also very similar weight, maybe a smidge lighter. I was looking for something compact that had the kicking vibrating bass of one of my Bogasing M4 Speakers, especially at low volume. I found JBL Go3 1st, then BoomCore. Boomcore got loud, but had the same level if not less vibration bass and kick than G3. But then I discovered something I never messed with. I used my Audio Effects equalizer adjustment from my phone and set to Extreme Bass, then boom both speakers kicked crazy for their sizes. With Extreme Bass Audio Effects equalizer on this little beast woke up and wanted to be the mini bogasing I was looking for, since the BogasingM10 let me down btw, no bass on that, even after Audio Effects. Without adjustments Boomcore just gets really really loud with a decent thumping bass, but with Extreme Bass setting on plus pushing volume up on Boomcore to max, this became my primary ultra mini bass speaker.Note, I have no test results on Battery Life and Water Resistance, it's not my primary speaker. Bose SoundLink Flex is my favorite compact deep bass speaker with my custom settings. Bogasing M4 is my Favorite semi-compact super thumping bass speaker. Boomcore became my favorite mini thumping bass speaker.

reviews.reviewTitle: Für die Grösse und Preis ausreichender Klang und Lautstärke
reviews.reviewText: Ich habe den Speaker für knapp 21 Euro erworben.Dafür bekomme ich einen Speaker in guter Grösse, der Recht angenehm in der Hand liegt. Die Verbindung ist leicht und unkompliziert aufgebaut. Auch die Töne sind Recht leise und nerven nicht. Die Lautstärke ist Recht passabel und verzehrt am Ende nur minimal. Ich habe ihn erst daheim auf einen Echtholztisch getestet . Fand den Klang dann erst nicht so berauschend. Später aufgegangen in der Dusche war er voluminöser. Später auf dem Desk im Büro hat er mich dann doch nochmal überzeugt. Bei kleinen Räumen wirkt er vom Klang besser. Als Referenz dazu habe ich daheim auch noch eine. Huawei CM510. Dieser hat dagegen nur bei den Höhen einen leichten Vorteil aber sonst keine Chance gegen dieses Produkt. Alle anderen Bluetooth Speaker daheim spiele in einer anderen Klasse und können hier nicht mit verglichen werden.Für den bezahlten Preis empfehle ich diesen aber weiter.

Ich habe mir die Box für meine Arbeit im Seniorenheim bestellt. Bin über die Qualität extrem überrascht, positiv! Tolle Qualität, super Lautstärke, keine Unterbrechungen oder Störungen. Alle Senioren konnten mit 1 Musikbox ihre Weihnachtsmusik auf der Station hören. 2 Kolleginnen haben sich die Box auch gleich bestellt. Super 😃

reviews.reviewTitle: Super Preis-Leistung, ein bisschen zu viel Bässe
reviews.reviewText: Die kleine Box tut, was sie soll. Sie beschallt uns im Badezimmer zufriedenstellend.Der Sound ist schon recht tiefenlastig, aber für die Größe und den Preis doch angemessen gut.Einziges kleines Problem war bisher, dass sich mein Handy auch automatisch, gleichzeitig an eine zweite in unserem Haushalt befindliche Lautsprecherbox verbunden hat und dann leider auf beiden nichts abspielen wollte. Ich muss nun jedesmal die Kopplung für die Box, die ich nicht nutzen möchte manuell entfernen. Das ist schon ein bisschen nervig. Deshalb auch nur vier Sterne.
Super tolle kleine handliche Box mit mega guten Sound. Für das Geld toll

Wir haben mehrere Bluetooth-Box bestellt und probiert. Diese hier war unsere 1. Wahl. Sie hat einen sehr guten und starken Klang im Vergleich zu den anderen Box, die wir probiert haben, und ist sehr gut zum Musik-Hören geeignet.
